text: when it comes to succeeding in the
workplace a college degree isn't enough
nor is yours of experience on the job
well that's because the most demanded
skills that employers crave for are the
soft skills the important qualities that
enable you to work and interact with the
people around you effectively having
great soft skills can be a huge
game-changer as you go through your
career it can be the difference between
getting people to believe in you or
being forgotten
so these skills teach you not just to be
a better employee but to be a stellar
human being as well so today I'm going
to share with you five soft skills that
are essential for taking your career to
the next level my name is Michelle and
you can watch this complete session on
skillopedia the place to develop skills
for the real world you can find the link
either in the description box or by
